rules.title: <red>No Hacking</red>
rules.description: <gray>Using any modified clients, cheats or unfair advantages is strictly prohibited.</gray>

rules.title: <red>Respect All Players</red>
rules.description: <gray>Be respectful to everyone. Harassment, discrimination, and hate speech will not be tolerated.</gray>

rules.title: <red>No Spamming</red>
rules.description: <gray>Excessive messages, caps, or flooding chat is not allowed.</gray>

rules.title: <red>No Advertising</red>
rules.description: <gray>Do not advertise other servers or unrelated content.</gray>

rules.title: <red>Use Common Sense</red>
rules.description: <gray>If something seems like it would break the rules, it probably does.</gray>
